channel.title: NPC drops and placement
channel.description:
I have this on my NPCdrops.cfg needing to know which each one is I know the amount and item id's i just don't know the others //kalphite queen npcdrop = 1160 3140 1 2 npcdrop = 1160 995 25000 35 npcdrop = 1160 2857 1 1 npcdrop = 1160 2858 1 1 npcdrop = 1160 526 1 100
And I was wondering if I put a teleport somewhere, If I can have it go somewhere like when you go in it it will bring you to like godwars or something...

item.title: NPC drops and placement
item.dc:creator: @dy3p8ntrkid dy3p8ntrkid
item.description:
@dy3p8ntrkid wrote:

Alright, so you know how you have the .cfg files right? Well they had a little colored icon like red blue yellow and green or sumtin, then after when I asked to open them as notepads, it changed them all and I don’t know what to open them as again to make them work. I’ll take a pic for you.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 18, 2009, 08:05:33 pm[/size][hr][quote=“znick55, post:4, topic:279147”]um what?!?!?!?
dont understand u?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 18, 2009, 07:57:04 pm[/size][hr]oh i think i know what u mean… btw your supposed to open cfg’s in notepad lol[/quote]

yeah but when I try and edit the npcdrops or whatever I go in game (when edited client is closed) and shops don’t work nor do the drops, I tested a daggonnath with 100% for bones, and doesnt work.

Read full topic

item.title: NPC drops and placement
item.dc:creator: @znick55 znick55
item.description:
@znick55 wrote:

[quote=“dy3p8ntrkid, post:1, topic:279147”]I have this on my NPCdrops.cfg needing to know which each one is I know the amount and item id’s i just don’t know the others
//kalphite queen
npcdrop = 1160 3140 1 2
npcdrop = 1160 995 25000 35
npcdrop = 1160 2857 1 1
npcdrop = 1160 2858 1 1
npcdrop = 1160 526 1 100

And I was wondering if I put a teleport somewhere, If I can have it go somewhere like when you go in it it will bring you to like godwars or something…[/quote]

1160 is npc id 3140 is item id 1 is amount and 2 is the percent of the drop =D hope it helps

for the teleport thing i dont really understand what u mean =\
